MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode areas of Pwllheli and Chwilog. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to connect a generator to restore power for those customers still off supply. We are working to have the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:47PM on 10th November 2020
